title: Paisa Note Song Lyrics
stanzas:
paisa note uththupaathen
gandhiyathaan kaanom
un mugamthaan theriyuthu
enna panna naanum

kovilukkul poi paathen
saamiyathaan kaanom
saami silai polirukkum
nee mattumthaan venum

enakku nee
mattumthaan venum
indhaadi paalu
pazham thaenum
karpooram yethuvandi naanum
nee venum enakku
ovvorunaalum

thaenu mittaai lippukku
thevaiyillai lipsticku
vennilavu eye-ukku
venaamadi Eyetex-u

thaarumaaru renge-la
vachirukken nenjula
vera level azhagula
paakurendi kannula

kadhal tholviya
paathavandi naanu
firstu lovvula
thoththavandi naanu

lovvukkaaga yengurendi naanu
ullangaiyila thaangiduven-nu
ada sathiyama solluren
yemmela sathiyama solluren
ummela sathiyama solluren
seekiram solli thola
vaaya yenda mellura

andha maari indha maari
unna maari yaarumilla
unna maari enna maari
jodi illa oorukkulla

vera maari aachupulla
ellaam maari pochu ulla
nee mattum thaan venum
vera yaarum thevai illa.

paisa note uththupaathen

enna panna naanum

kovilukkul poi paathen
saamiyathaan kaanom

nee mattumthaan venum

enakku nee
mattumthaan venum
indhaadi paalu
pazham thaenum
karpooram yethuvandi naanum
nee venum enakku
ovvorunaalum

andha maari indha maari
unna maari yaarumilla
unna maari enna maari
jodi illa oorukkulla

vera maari aachupulla
ellaam maari pochu ulla
nee mattum thaan venum
vera yaarum thevai illa.
